page.title: 02GRAFFHAM PLAYGROUP
page.content: Mrs. Fenneymore began the playgroup 25 years ago with 10 children in the Empire Hall. It is held on four mornings and costs Â£1. There are 29 children going altogther but only 20 at once. There are 2 supervisors, Mrs. Dodswell and Mrs. Rogers and 6 assistants, mothers also help. They need 4 adults to ensure safety. The supervisor arranges the activities, equipment and fund-raising. They break for refreshments and songs. They have walks and go to Goodwood for a teddy bears picnic and the swings. They have lots of equipment and books and believe that the playgroup helps the children prepare for school and also make new friends. They also visit the school as much as possible.
